item.description: Come hear from volunteer green space stewards! Our panelists will offer insight on how to keep the momentum behind your stewardship efforts. They will also speak about how all efforts of a project can be effectively shared by all those who are committed to and benefit from the project. Come hear from the experts and join in a lively discussion about how to reach your stewardship goals.
item.how_to_find_us: Take the red or orange line to Downtown Crossing or the Green Line to Park Street and walk to 62 Summer Street. The entrance is around the corner on Otis Street
item.name: UWC Speaker Series: Keeping the Spirit in Stewardship
